name: Would You Rather
setup: Players take turns asking each other 'Would you rather' questions, presenting two options.
gameplay: Each player must choose one of the options presented and explain their choice to the group.
winning: There's no strict winning condition, as the game is more about sharing opinions and getting to know each other. Players can simply enjoy the discussion and learn more about their teammates' preferences.
